channel.title: [562] Connection Error NO SOLUTION SO FAR!
channel.description:
Ok, So heres my problem:
1. Start Source, works fine (NO PROBLEM) 2. People connect (NO PROBLEM) 3. I try connecting from Ipchanger/anotherclient with my ip (PROBLEM) Wont let me connect to my owner server says "error_game_js5connect"
If Your going to post a reply dont tell me the following things: 1. You didnt portforward right (i've done alot of coding i did it right) 2. Your No-ip isnt right (It is so..yeah) 3. Source is screwed up (it works fine for other people
I've tried connecting using "blank Ip" "127.0.0.1" and my own specialized ip address for server (not advertising)
